content:
Defense Minister of UK, Grant Shapps recorded a video from the Kyiv Center and called on the international community to support Ukraine.

He stated this on Twitter.

I’m in Kyiv to raise the alarm to the democratic world – we must make sure Ukraine wins this war.

The UK has stepped up to do more than ever, with our largest military support package to date. Every nation must now do the same and ensure freedom triumphs over tyranny.pic.twitter.com/DYbOcCUkho

— Rt Hon Grant Shapps MP (@grantshapps)March 8, 2024

"I am in Kiev to raise anxiety in the democratic world - we must make sure that Ukraine will win this war," the Shappal Grant wrote.

In his post, he indicated that the United Kingdom has done more than ever, giving Ukraine the largest military support package today.

"Now every country has to do the same and ensure the victory of freedom over tyranny," the chapsing grant summarized.

As reported by the Armyinform, Rustem Umerov at a meeting with a grant of Shappstoldon the needs of the Armed Forces and the situation on the front.
title: British Defense Minister in Kiev addressed the international community: "I'm here to beat

author: Army Inform
